description: This file provides utility functions for creating and managing HTTP message body objects within a larger HTTP implementation. It includes a license header, module description, and a single function HttpCreateMessageBody that delegates object creation to HttpMboCreate.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpCreateMessageBody(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new HTTP message body object by invoking HttpMboCreate with the provided context handles.
